DOC.brief_title: Efficiency New Therapy Treat Stenosis Coronary Vessels Comparison With Two Already Admitted Therapies
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study examine whether patient stable instable Angina pectoris and/or document myocardial ischemia presence de-novo stenosis native coronary artery degree stenosis 50 % 99 % additional local administration paclitaxel implantation conventional stent superior implantation conventional stent alone respect late lumen loss ( LLL ) . In case superiority examine whether additional local administration paclitaxel implantation conventional stent inferior implantation paclitaxel-eluting stent respect late lumen-luss . Is case , superiority test .
